comment.author: 33472394@N00
comment._content: The wedding of Woodrow Wilson and Edith Bolling Galt on December 18, 1915?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: No, the White House wedding of the President's daughter, Jessie Woodrow Wilson, to Francis Bowes Sayre, on November 25, 1913. Another Bain/LOC photo of the crowd of would-be spectators: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4626425055/in/p... [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4626425055/in/photostream/]
